title: Ticket #7081: Leverage SANs for GSI host authentication
description:
It appears that GSI host verification is not working with SANs (particularly in the context of the HTCondor-CE). This means that a unique certificate is required for each CE -- a somewhat costly proposition if you are paying per-certificate.

I believe the underlying GSI libraries support SANs, so the fix is potentially straightforward.

In order to test, one can easily get a cert with appropriate SANs utilizing Let's Encrypt. May need to control the DNS settings of a web domain to do this.

Reported by Bockjoo Kim from UFlorida.
